projectTitle: Project-1:  Advanced Kidney Disease Classification Utilizing MLflow and DVC for Robust Machine Learning Pipelines
projectDetails:
üî¨ Advanced Kidney Disease Classification: Scalable ML Pipeline

This project focuses on building a robust and scalable machine learning pipeline to classify advanced kidney disease stages. Utilizing MLflow for managing the machine learning lifecycle and DVC for dataset and model versioning, it ensures reproducibility and seamless collaboration.


Key Features:

- ‚öôÔ∏è Scalable Pipeline: Tracks experiments, manages models, and optimizes workflows.  

- üß† Accurate Classification: Trained on kidney disease datasets, offering precise stage predictions.  

- üîÑ Continuous Improvement: Designed for scalability, enabling healthcare institutions to maintain and update models efficiently.


This solution empowers healthcare providers to monitor disease progression and implement effective treatment plans.

projectTitle: Project-2:  Predicting Social Media Addiction: A Machine Learning Approach.
projectDetails:
üåê Predicting Social Media Addiction: A Machine Learning Approach

Developed an advanced machine learning model to predict social media addiction by analyzing user interaction data across platforms. The project used üìä GBM, SVM, and RNN algorithms, integrated with üß† TensorFlow, Keras, and PyTorch, for high-accuracy predictions.


Key Contributions:  

- üìâ Data Analysis: Processed user engagement and temporal patterns.  

- ‚öôÔ∏è Predictive Modeling: Built and optimized models using hyperparameter tuning.  

- üéØ Model Interpretability: Applied SHAP and LIME for actionable insights.  

- üìä Visualization: Created interactive dashboards with Plotly and Dash for real-time data visualization.


This project empowers mental health experts and social media platforms to identify and address addictive behaviors.

This is a 4 years of a Super store sales data. Used Tools: i) Power Query. ii) Merge. iii) Data cleaning. iv) Modeling. v) Custom Column. vi) Conditional Column. vii) Pivot Table viii) Math Function. ix) Different Charts. Firstly I take the data into power query of excel, Where I clean the data, do data modeling, use merge queries, append queries and load the data as a table format. Then I use some functions and most of the work is done by Pivot Table. Its a two sheet dashboard. First page for Sales Analysis and the other one for Product Analysis.
